title: Honest Long Cut Unopened Full Tobacco Pack
author: canjond

posts.post_title: Honest Long Cut Unopened Full Tobacco Pack
posts.post_content:
Well, I can tell you that this pack is  unopened, however don't get your hopes up - it will not have a card inside (and priced accordingly).  The pack is in beautiful condition with no major flaws at all.  I would guess, however, that this dates to around 1918-1922.  $60.00 shipped.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=28077&d=1290633089[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=28078&d=1290633098[/IMG]
Barry - emailed you back.  Good to hear from you.

i'm mighty happy to get the HLC from you to put alongside my t227 bender.
always great doing business with the King of the Packs!!!
happy thanksgiving, ole buddy.
best,
barry
